statements: SELECT * FROM rental_unit_usage
SELECT unit_id, total_expenditure FROM rental_unit_usage
SELECT unit_id, electricity_usage, water_usage, gas_usage FROM rental_unit_usage
SELECT * FROM rental_unit_usage WHERE total_expenditure > 100
SELECT unit_id, electricity_usage FROM rental_unit_usage ORDER BY electricity_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_unit_usage WHERE unit_id = 1;
SELECT unit_id, electricity_usage, water_usage FROM rental_unit_usage WHERE electricity_usage > 50;
SELECT * FROM rental_unit_usage WHERE gas_usage IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gas_usage DESC;
SELECT unit_id, total_expenditure FROM rental_unit_usage WHERE electricity_usage < 100 AND water_usage < 50 ORDER BY total_expenditure ASC;
SELECT AVG(electricity_usage) AS avg_electricity, AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water FROM rental_unit_usage;
SELECT * FROM rental_units;
SELECT unit_number, tenant_name FROM rental_units WHERE utility_usage > 100;
SELECT tenant_name, total_expenditure FROM rental_units ORDER BY total_expenditure DESC;
SELECT unit_id, utility_payments.payment_date, amount_paid FROM utility_payments JOIN rental_units ON utility_payments.unit_id = rental_units.unit_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_units WHERE unit_number IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT unit_id, unit_number, tenant_name FROM rental_units WHERE tenant_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM utility_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY amount_paid DESC;
SELECT tenant_name, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_payments FROM rental_units JOIN utility_payments ON rental_units.unit_id = utility_payments.unit_id GROUP BY tenant_name;
SELECT tenant_name, AVG(utility_usage) AS average_utility_usage FROM rental_units GROUP BY tenant_name HAVING AVG(utility_usage) > 50;
SELECT * FROM rental_units WHERE total_expenditure > (SELECT AVG(total_expenditure) FROM rental_units);
SELECT * FROM rental_units;
SELECT unit_name, unit_type FROM rental_units ORDER BY unit_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM utility_usage WHERE electricity_usage > 100 AND water_usage > 50;
SELECT exp_id, electricity_cost, gas_cost FROM expenditure WHERE gas_cost < 200 ORDER BY exp_id ASC;
SELECT unit_name, area_sqft FROM rental_units WHERE unit_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT * FROM rental_units;
SELECT unit_name, area_sqft FROM rental_units ORDER BY unit_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM utility_usage WHERE electricity_usage > 100 AND gas_usage < 50;
SELECT unit_id, SUM(electricity_cost + water_cost + gas_cost) AS total_expenditure FROM expenditure GROUP BY unit_id;
SELECT unit_id, MAX(electricity_usage) AS max_electricity_usage FROM utility_usage GROUP BY unit_id HAVING max_electricity_usage > 200;
SELECT * FROM RentalUnit;
SELECT unit_name, monthly_rent FROM RentalUnit ORDER BY monthly_rent DESC;
SELECT unit_name, unit_size FROM RentalUnit WHERE unit_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM UtilityMeter WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT expenditure_type, expenditure_amount FROM Expenditure ORDER BY expenditure_amount DESC;
SELECT unit_name, monthly_rent FROM RentalUnit WHERE unit_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UtilityMeter ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure FROM Expenditure WHERE expenditure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT unit_name, efficiency_rating FROM RentalUnit JOIN EnergyEfficiency ON RentalUnit.unit_id = EnergyEfficiency.unit_id;
SELECT AVG(usage_value) AS avg_usage, MAX(usage_value) AS max_usage FROM UtilityMeter WHERE meter_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT * FROM rental_units;
SELECT unit_name, monthly_rent FROM rental_units;
SELECT unit_name, square_footage FROM rental_units WHERE monthly_rent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM utility_meters ORDER BY last_read_date DESC;
SELECT unit_name, meter_type, starting_reading FROM rental_units JOIN utility_meters ON rental_units.unit_id = utility_meters.unit_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_units LIMIT 5;
SELECT unit_id, unit_name, monthly_rent FROM rental_units WHERE monthly_rent > 1000;
SELECT unit_name, square_footage FROM rental_units ORDER BY square_footage DESC;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, latest_reading FROM utility_meters WHERE latest_reading < 500;
SELECT * FROM utility_expenses JOIN utility_meters ON utility_expenses.meter_id = utility_meters.meter_id WHERE expense_amount > 200;
